name: Easy Subscribe
author: Devnet

sections.description:
Easy Subscribe is a user-friendly WordPress plugin that seamlessly integrates customizable newsletter forms into your website. With a simple shortcode, you can effortlessly place subscription forms anywhere on your site, connecting with your audience in a sleek and modern way.

Simplify Your Email Marketing Journey
Say goodbye to the complexities of third-party integrations. Easy Subscribe provides a straightforward solution for website owners eager to kickstart their email marketing efforts. No intricate configurations required—start collecting subscribers immediately. With customization options, Material Design aesthetics, and CSV export functionality, Easy Subscribe becomes your go-to tool for building and managing a thriving subscriber base, all within the comfort of your WordPress environment.

DOCUMENTATION | EASY SUBSCRIBE PRO

Key Features

  1. Material Design Aesthetics: Elevate your website’s visual appeal with a sleek and modern subscription form.
  2. Simple Shortcode Integration: Place the subscription form anywhere using an intuitive shortcode, enhancing user interaction.
  3. Customizable Form Design: Tailor the form to match your website’s branding and design for a cohesive and professional appearance.
  4. Dedicated Subscriber Management: Effortlessly manage your subscriber list.

PRO plan Features

  • Multiple forms
  • Multiple subscription lists
  • Last name field
  • Confirmation – redirect to URL
  • Option to show only to logged-in users
  • More design options
  • Custom CSS
  • Customizable CSV output
  • Delete subscribers
  • Priority support

WooCommerce Add-on

  • Auto-subscribe users on order creation/completion
  • Migration of billing emails from existing orders to subscription list

Usage

  1. Insert the shortcode [easy-subscribe] wherever you want the form to appear.
  2. Customize form settings in the plugin settings page.

Documentation

You can check Easy Subscribe documentation here.

Early Development Notice

Easy Subscribe is in the early stages of development, and we’re committed to enhancing its features over time. We plan to integrate options for popular email services and introduce additional functionalities in future updates.

Your feedback is invaluable! If you have specific requirements or suggestions, please feel free to request a feature in the support forum. We appreciate your support and look forward to making Easy Subscribe even better with your input.

Support

We’re here to help. Feel free to open a new thread on the Support Forum.

Reviews

It’s funny how much joy all those 5-star reviews bring to our team. It really keeps us going and motivates us to bring more cool features.
If you like this plugin, feel free to leave a review.
sections.installation:
This plugin can be easily installed like any other WordPress integration by following the steps below:

  1. Download the plugin ZIP file.
  2. Go to your WordPress dashboard.
  3. Navigate to Plugins > Add New.
  4. Click Upload Plugin and choose the ZIP file.
  5. Activate the plugin.
sections.changelog:
1.2.2

  • Fix – Update database error when activating plugin
  • Update – Freemius SDK
  • Performance – WP tested up to: 6.6

1.2.1

  • Fix – small fields label position
  • Add – Lighten Form Fields option
  • Add – Custom breakpoints option
  • Update – Freemius SDK

1.2.0

  • Fix – minor style fixes
  • Add – Preview background color switcher
  • Update – Database table structure
  • Performance – WP tested up to: 6.5

1.1.1

  • Fix: multilingual option
  • Add: Honeypot Anti-Spam
  • Add: Form layout options
  • Add: Form style options
  • Add: Freemius integration

1.1.0

  • Add: Settings page
  • Add: Subscribers table page
  • Add: Download list of subscribers in csv file
  • Update: Form styles

1.0.0

  • First Launch

short_description: Quickly integrate modern, customizable subscription forms into your website to simplify email marketing, increase subscribers, and boost engagement.
